freesmartphone.org Framework DBus Interface Specification

org.freesmartphone.GSM.CallForwarding

Description

Namespace

org.freesmartphone.GSM.CallForwarding

Methods

  • DisableAll
  • Enable
  • Disable

Signals

None

Properties

None

Errors

None

Methods

DisableAll ( )

Description: Disable all active call forwarding rules.

Enable ( sssi )

Description: Enable a call forwarding rule for the specified class and reason.

Parameters

s: cls

Name of the bearer the call forwarding rule should be enabled for. Valid classes are:

  • "voice",
  • "data",
  • "voice+data",
  • "fax",
  • "voice+data+fax".
    • Rarely you might also encounter:
    • "sms",
    • "dcs",
    • "dca",
    • "dpa",
    • "pad".

    s: reason

    Reason for which you want to enable network call forwarding: Valid reasons are:

    • "unconditional"
    • "mobile busy"
    • "no reply"
    • "not reachable"
    • "all"
    • "all conditional"

    s: number

    Number calls should be forwarded to.

    i: timeout

    Number of seconds after which the call forwarding rule gets active.

    Disable ( ss )

    Parameters

    s: cls

    Name of the bearer the call forwarding rule should be disabled for. See Enable for valid classes.

    s: reason

    Reason for which you want to disable call forwarding. See Enable for valid reasons.
